abstract: The company reported on Thursday that 1.3 million subscribers dropped its wireless service in the fourth quarter, contributing to a 14 percent decline in revenue.
snippet: The company reported on Thursday that 1.3 million subscribers dropped its wireless service in the fourth quarter, contributing to a 14 percent decline in revenue.
lead_paragraph: Sprint Nextel reported on Thursday that 1.3 million subscribers dropped its wireless service in the fourth quarter, contributing to a 14 percent decline in revenue.

headline.main: For Sprint Nextel, a Drop in Customers and Earnings
headline.print_headline: For Sprint Nextel, a Drop In Customers and Earnings
